DOC.brief_summary: Video documentation vaginal delivery evaluate impact support perineum
DOC.detailed_description: Documentation support perineum via video camera , documentation birth trauma delivery , record fetal maternal parameter weight , hight , fetal presentation , etc .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman , least 18 year age ( yoa ) , term delivery ( least 37+0 week gestation ) , vaginal delivery , fetal vertex presentation , single pregnancy young 18 yoa , preterm delivery , cesarean section , fetal malformation , maternal disease form collagenosis , multiple pregnancy , vaginal/vulvar/perineal preoperations ( exclude birth trauma ) , perineal birth trauma grade III+IV
